scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js   npm run test
scripts.test-report: NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js report -r html node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha  --timeout=10000  --exit  test/**/*.spec.js && xdg-open ./coverage/index.html >/dev/null 2>&1
scripts.test-jenkins: NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout=10000    --exit  test/**/*.spec.js && NODE_ENV='test' node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js report -r html node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout=10000   --exit  test/**/*.spec.js
